Amount.description: The total amount that's disbursed to the awardee.

DisbursementDate.description: The actual date and time of funds disbursement.

FundingAwardId.description: The funding award that's associated with the funding disbursement.

IsApproved.description: Indicates whether the funding disbursement is approved (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

Name.description: The autogenerated name of the funding disbursement.

PaymentMethodType.description: Specifies the payment method for funds disbursement.

PaymentNumber.description: The unique identifier of the payment related to the funds disbursement.

ScheduledDate.description: The scheduled date and time to disburse the funds.

Status.description: Specifies the approval status of the funds disbursement.
